translationtableentry.text: Ogni giocatore parte da una punta della mappa. Davanti alla fortezza si apre un passaggio di montagna che conduce al centro del territorio. Il primo ad arrivare potrà conquistare 4 forti commerciali e sarà in vantaggio rispetto agli altri.
translationtableentry.result: Each player starts from one point of the map. In front of the stronghold there is a mountain passage that leads to the center of the territory. The first to arrive will be able to conquer 4 trade outposts and will have an advantage over the others.

translationtableentry.text: Cada jugador comienza en un punto del mapa. Delante de la fortaleza se abre un paso de montaña que conduce al centro del territorio. El primero en llegar podrá conquistar 4 fortines de comercio y tendrá ventaja sobre los demás.
translationtableentry.result: Each player starts from one point of the map. In front of the stronghold there is a mountain passage that leads to the center of the territory. The first to arrive will be able to conquer 4 trade outposts and will have an advantage over the others.
